long_description: Featuring a flat top and short brim, the REI Sahara Cadet Cape hat combines style with function to shade you from the sun during summer adventures on the water and in the mountains. Soft, breathable nylon fabric is lightweight and quick drying; with a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Rear cape offers additional sun protection for your neck; roll the cape up and stash it in the interior pocket when not needed. Foam-stiffened bill offers sun protection for your eyes and face; brim keeps the hat afloat in water. CoolMax(R) polyester inner headband wicks away moisture to keep sweat out of your eyes. Mesh venting at the sides and back of the hat keep air moving. Adjustable elastic cord cinches for a comfortable, secure fit.
short_description: Featuring a flat top and short brim, the REI Sahara Cadet Cape hat combines style with function to shade you from the sun during summer adventures on the water and in the mountains.
